alert.note: Alert for Juab; Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:57PM MDT until June 23 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Juab County in central Utah... Southeastern Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 545 PM MDT * At 457 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southeast of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, or 20 miles southwest of Dugway English Village, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet reported gust to 66 mph. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Rush Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
